post.author: thomas lee
post.content:
I just became the second time father. It is very late compare to other people. My father in-law told me that he had my wife at very late age. Still he was 7 years younger than I was. I like to accept this daunting challenge gladly. I welcome the opportunity. Because I was not good father first time. Fatherhood or parenthood did not come with the manual. I was not prepared or ready. Beside my fatherhood project had changed daily basis. Infant, kindergarten, elementary school and high school.
Now I know what not to do. - I should be a friend not a teacher. - My authority is not very important - My kids follow what I do not what I tell them to do - If I have bad habits, there are very high chances they will have the same bad habits. - My kids are my mirror images of me - I should negotiate with my kids not command - Some say itâ€™s not quantity but quality of time spent together. It is quantity in my opinion. - I have to tell my kids how much I love them. Not just think about it - Hug is the best medicine in most of time. - I should enjoy the moment and the journey. - Manual can be generated if I and my kids talk - My influence is overly greater than all the teaches my kids will ever meet - There are absolutely no room for physical purnishment at any conditions
Here are the questions. - How can I be a friend not a teacher ? - How to talk to my own kid without getting uptight ? - Can we produce the basic manual among ourselves ? - Do I need family mission or vision like business ? - What kinds of values should I preach to my kids ?
I am waiting for your highly regarded ideas.
post.title: RE: Workshop : How to raise our kids ?
